option1.name: includeChildProjects
option1.label: Include child project data? (True/False)
option1.description: Should the report include data from child projects? (True/False)

option2.name: restrictedLicensesOnly
option2.label: Limit the report to just restricted licenses? (True/False)
option2.description: Should the report include only changes from licenses outlined in the restricted_license.py file or all changes? (True/False)
